peer_reviews.summary: In this article, Dr. Iodice and associates presented the results on the correlation between continuous and intermittent ScvO2 values, obtained with a fiber-optic oximetry catheter (PediaSat) and standard blood gas measurements, respectively. In addition, S

peer_reviews.title: Fiberoptic monitoring of central venous oxygen saturation (PediaSat) in small children undergoing cardiac surgery: continuous is not continuous
peer_reviews.summary:
The authors have improved their manuscript. The statistical analysis is correct. The results are well presented and the discussion is focused.  
I thank the authors for having followed my suggestions.  
Sincerely,  
Sabino Scolletta

peer_reviews.title: Fiberoptic monitoring of central venous oxygen saturation (PediaSat) in small children undergoing cardiac surgery: continuous is not continuous
